segments.text: I don't know . I only started looking for a job a few days ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Have you found anything that you're interested in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've only found a few openings in my field .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: what kind of job are you looking for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm trying to find a job in sound engineering .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: there's not a very high demand for that kind of job , is there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: unfortunately not . If I can't find anything in the field , then I could also work in the tourism field .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that's a good idea . You have plenty of experience in the tourism industry , don't you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: by the way , I saw a job in the paper this morning that you might be interested in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: it's a job at a recruitment agency .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: that's interesting . Do you think they'd hire me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: well , you have plenty of experience job hunting . I think you'd be the perfect person for the job !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: that's true . I might as well call them up and see if I can get an interview . Do you have the details ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: sure , it's the ad circled with a red pen in the middle of the classifieds . Good luck !
segments.speaker: S1
